faq.headline: Questions & Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about your BONGO experience, from booking to aftercare.

items.question: How do I book an appointment at BONGO?
items.answer: You can book through our website by clicking 'Book Your Glow', call us at (555) BONGO-GLO, or use our BONGO app for instant scheduling. We recommend booking 3-5 days ahead for color services and special occasions.

items.question: What happens during my first BONGO experience?
items.answer: Your journey begins with a complimentary Glow Consultation where our artists assess your skin, hair, or beauty goals. We'll create a personalized treatment plan and recommend products suited to your unique needs. Please arrive 15 minutes early for a welcome ritual.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We kindly request 24 hours notice for cancellations or changes. Late cancellations may incur a 50% service fee. For bridal and group bookings, we require 72 hours notice. We always try to accommodate emergencies with understanding.

items.question: Are BONGO products clean and cruelty-free?
items.answer: Absolutely. BONGO is committed to clean beauty. All our products are cruelty-free, vegan-friendly, and formulated without parabens, sulfates, or harmful chemicals. We partner with ethical brands that share our values.

items.question: Do you offer bridal and event packages?
items.answer: Yes! Our Luminous Bridal Experience includes trials, day-of services, and options for your entire party. We also offer packages for photoshoots, galas, and milestone celebrations. Schedule a bridal consultation to design your perfect look.

items.question: What safety standards does BONGO follow?
items.answer: Your wellbeing is paramount. BONGO maintains medical-grade sanitation with sterilized tools, single-use items, and thorough cleaning between each guest. Our studio features advanced air purification and all team members follow strict hygiene protocols.
